  • Method Details

    • addProduct

      public boolean addProduct​(java.lang.String reference, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, java.lang.Integer quantity, java.lang.Integer price)
      Here method that adds product at the list
      Parameters:
      reference - product reference
      name - product name
      description - product description
      quantity - product quantity
      price - product price
      Returns:
      if product or price or count isn't between 1 and 1000, it will return false. Otherwise it will return true

    • changeProductReference

      public boolean changeProductReference​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String reference)
      Here method that changes product reference at the list
      Parameters:
      name - product name
      reference - product reference
      Returns:
      if it isn't at list of product, it will return false. Otherwise it will return true

    • deleteProduct

      public void deleteProduct​(java.lang.String name)
      Here method that deletes product from list and file
      Parameters:
      name - name of product

    • changeProductName

      public boolean changeProductName​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String newName)
      Here method that changes product name at the list
      Parameters:
      name - product name
      newName - new product name
      Returns:
      if it isn't at list of product, it will return false. Otherwise it will return true

      public boolean changeProductPrice​(java.lang.String name, int price)
      Here method that changes product reference at the list
      Parameters:

      price - product price
      Returns:
